name: Evolution: Moon Warfare
description:
On a hidden moon base, a war rages on. Two factions fighting for control of the deadly Hilux bio-weapons. Choose a side and fight!

Fast paced, low gravity, online sci-fi FPS team deathmatch gameplay set in the Evolution universe containing one level in a moon setting. This is an early access game that we hope to add more levels/modes and refinements over time. Feel free to join the discord to give feedback, let us know what you would like to see added/refined over time.
